Reviews.Title: “good location”
Reviews.Author: VujaBeograd
Reviews.Content: location 5 minutes istiklal street beautiful pedestrian zone staffalways serviceit hotel nighttime food breakfast bad sleep loud music nightclub hotel istanbul enjoy nightlife dont breakfast hotel hotel bad choice

Reviews.Title: “Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Carolyn H
Reviews.Content: hotel overpriced 70 euro basic people change due dirty holes sticking plasters doors windows facing fire escapes moved views updating bar reception served drinks breakfast okay variety items time look boutique hotel spoil visit istanbul lovely hilly views

Reviews.Title: “cheap and clean worth wat ur paying”
Reviews.Author: AdnanOmar
Reviews.Content: clean iv month nd people nice cares night sleeping clean nice hotel staff plesant except lobby food deal stayed week internet lobby nd safe box lobby soo ur istanbul nd enjoy city sleep suggest hotel nd dont believe reviews cockroach clean arab guests staff arabic plus
